title: Daily Life with Reasons
description: Learn A2+ daily-life sentences using '因為/所以/為了'.

steps.teacher: 我早上七點起床，因為八點要上班。
expected_answer: 我早上七點起床，因為八點要上班。
steps.pinyin: wǒ zǎo shàng qī diǎn qǐ chuáng, yīn wèi bā diǎn yào shàng bān.
steps.english_hint: I get up at 7 because I work at 8.

steps.teacher: 我通常搭地鐵，因為比公車快。
expected_answer: 我通常搭地鐵，因為比公車快。
steps.pinyin: wǒ tōng cháng dā dì tiě, yīn wèi bǐ gōng chē kuài.
steps.english_hint: I usually take the metro because it's faster than the bus.

steps.pinyin: wǒ zhōng wǔ huì chū qù mǎi wǔ cān.
steps.english_hint: I go out to buy lunch at noon.

steps.teacher: 下班後我會運動一下，為了保持健康。
expected_answer: 下班後我會運動一下，為了保持健康。
steps.pinyin: xià bān hòu wǒ huì yùn dòng yí xià, wèi le bǎo chí jiàn kāng.
steps.english_hint: I exercise after work to stay healthy.

steps.teacher: 我晚上會看一點書，放鬆一下。
expected_answer: 我晚上會看一點書，放鬆一下。
steps.pinyin: wǒ wǎn shàng huì kàn yì diǎn shū, fàng sōng yí xià.
steps.english_hint: In the evening I read a bit to relax.

steps.teacher: 我喜歡散步，因為可以清醒頭腦。
expected_answer: 我喜歡散步，因為可以清醒頭腦。
steps.pinyin: wǒ xǐ huān sàn bù, yīn wèi kě yǐ qīng xǐng tóu nǎo.
steps.english_hint: I like walking because it clears my mind.

steps.pinyin: wǒ tōng cháng shí yī diǎn shuì jiào.

steps.teacher: 週末我會整理房間，因為平日太忙。
expected_answer: 週末我會整理房間，因為平日太忙。
steps.pinyin: zhōu mò wǒ huì zhěng lǐ fáng jiān, yīn wèi píng rì tài máng.
steps.english_hint: I clean my room on weekends because weekdays are too busy.

steps.teacher: 有時候我會看電影放鬆。
expected_answer: 有時候我會看電影放鬆。
steps.pinyin: yǒu shí hòu wǒ huì kàn diàn yǐng fàng sōng.
steps.english_hint: Sometimes I watch movies to relax.

steps.teacher: 為了提升自己，我每天都學一點新東西。
expected_answer: 為了提升自己，我每天都學一點新東西。
steps.pinyin: wèi le tí shēng zì jǐ, wǒ měi tiān dōu xué yì diǎn xīn dōng xī.
steps.english_hint: To improve myself, I learn something new every day.

review.summary: You practiced A2+ daily-life sentences with reasons.
